products.title: Voile FR Cobalt Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Voile FR Cobalt Blue Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £9.20 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Voile FR Cobalt Blue is a semi-translucent stylish, dark blue roller and is great for freshening up the look of any room.   Our Voile fabrics are a fabulous modern alternative to the traditional net curtain. A busy kitchen or living room will benefit from this delicate, translucent design in blue that will leave the space feeling open, light and airy. Flame Retardant and Pollergen-coated, makes this sheer roller blind a fantastic addition to your living space. 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, our customers and quality comes first, that's why we offer a five-year guarantee on our made-to-measure blinds. Based in West Yorkshire, our roller blinds are carefully cut and assembled by our expert roller team.

products.metadescription: Stockholm Midnight Blue Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £7.39 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Stockholm range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties & in addition to this is also moisture resistant.  This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites.  
 
 This rich Midnight Blue roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room. This dark blue fabric will look stunning paired with natural wooden tones or will offer a perfect splash of colour when hung in a cool, compemporary scheme. Our rollers are great for privacy and light control. 
 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This blue roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.title: Stirlo Royal Blue
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Stirlo Royal Blue Plain Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Stirlo Royal Blue Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show.  All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. products.title: Day & Night Effortless Royal Blue
products.metadescription: Day & Night Effortless Royal Blue
products.productdescription: Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, our Day & Night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work.

products.title: Konya Blackout Ink Blue
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Ink Blue Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Ink Blue Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Palate Maya Blue Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Palate Maya Blue Roller Blind
products.productdescription: The Palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.productdescription: The light turquoise blue colour of the Amor Baby Blue is as close to the famous colour as we can get. This is perfect for anyone wanting to add a touch of class to a room. This blind makes a great statement piece or as a match to similarly coloured furniture.  Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.  This blind can be made upto 400cm wide - much wider than all other blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our vertical blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you.

products.title: Infusion asc Azure Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Made to measure Infusion ASC Azure Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4118. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which  improves energy efficiency
products.productdescription: Infusion asc Azure Perfect Fit Pleated Blind Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.

products.title: Bella Blackout Sapphire Blue Panel Blind
products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Sapphire Blue Panel Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Bella Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and inside your home! 
 
This lush, Sapphure Blue panel blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure panel blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our panels are great for privacy and light control, especially for large spaces - reaching up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This dark blue panel blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.

products.metadescription: Bella Blackout Brittany Blue Panel Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £42.92 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Panel Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Simple, bold and cohesive, our Brittany Blue Bella Blackout panel blind blends minimal style with practical design.  A firm favourite, our Bella Blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - Whether its blackout panel blinds in the bedroom,  in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money.  
 
Panel blinds are great being used to create sections in large spaces, as they can be top fixed to ceilings and can span up to a massive 5 metres width and 3 metres drop!

products.title: Kingston Royal Blue Pleated Perfect Fit
products.metadescription: Kingston Royal Blue Pleated Perfect Fit
products.productdescription: Create a stunning statement piece out of your windows with Kingston Royal Blue Perfect Fit. The richness of the colour makes this a balancing force in rooms with strongly coloured furnishings, while the dimout fabric still allows some lightflow during the daytime, for a gentle softening effect. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, making it a great choice for conservatories which often have little wall space. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required

products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Splash Indigo Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £122.00 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Splash range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary.  This dark blue, almost navy, electric roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice.   Our electric roller blinds removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe.  Our Splash Indigo Blue roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens.  At Swift Direct Blinds, our modern, electric roller blinds are put together by the industry experts with decades of experience behind them, as such we are so confident with our high quality products, that this roller blind is covered with our FREE 5 year guarantee, provided for extra peace of mind when investing in our blinds.

products.productdescription:
Our Como range of fabrics bring a splash of colour to your home.  Perfect for summer, the combination of cool grey tones with warmer yellows and oranges means this blind can be ideal for any room. 
 
Como Ocra uses pale greens paired with grey tones make this blind ideal for your kitchen or bathroom.  Serene colours and a free-hand pattern create a suitable blind for your own getaway.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1866 Fabric Colour: Ocra Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes

products.metadescription: Boheme PVC Blackout Azure Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £151.50 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Add a smart, contemporary finish to your chosen room with this appealing modern pattern. Featuring eye-catching curvaceous abstract leaves with a subtle white outline on a rich azure blue background, Boheme PVC Blackout Azure Blue double-sided blind is bound to gain many compliments. Flame retardant, this electric roller blind is made out of a blackout fabric, so it won’t let light escape into your room, especially on a bright morning. products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £163.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
With a restful, Japanese floral pattern, this electric roller blind delivers an air of Zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is Pollergen™ treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.
